<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>global.PPMRoleClassMapper</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>PPMRoleClassMapper</name><script><![CDATA[PPMRoleClassMapper = Class.create();

PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap = {};

PPMRoleClassMapper.projectEntities = ['pm_project', 'tsp1_project', 'tsp2_project', 'tsp3_project', 'tsp4_project', 'tsp5_project'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.projectTaskEntities = ['pm_project_task', 'tsp1_project_task', 'tsp2_project_task', 'tsp3_project_task', 'tsp4_project_task', 'tsp5_project_task'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.portfolioEntities = ['pm_portfolio', 'tsp1_portfolio', 'tsp2_portfolio', 'tsp3_portfolio', 'tsp4_portfolio', 'tsp5_portfolio'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.portfolioProjectEntities = ['pm_portfolio_project', 'tsp1_portfolio_project', 'tsp2_portfolio_project', 'tsp3_portfolio_project', 'tsp4_portfolio_project', 'tsp5_portfolio_project'];

PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.pm_project = ['it_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp1_project = ['tsp1_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp2_project = ['tsp2_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp3_project = ['tsp3_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp4_project = ['tsp4_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp5_project = ['tsp5_project_user'];

PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.pm_project_task = ['it_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp1_project_task = ['tsp1_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp2_project_task = ['tsp2_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp3_project_task = ['tsp3_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp4_project_task = ['tsp4_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp5_project_task = ['tsp5_project_user'];

PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.pm_portfolio_project = ['it_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp1_portfolio_project = ['tsp1_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp2_portfolio_project = ['tsp2_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp3_portfolio_project = ['tsp3_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp4_portfolio_project = ['tsp4_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp5_portfolio_project = ['tsp5_project_portfolio_user'];

PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.pm_portfolio = ['it_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp1_portfolio = ['tsp1_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp2_portfolio = ['tsp2_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp3_portfolio = ['tsp3_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp4_portfolio = ['tsp4_project_portfolio_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp5_portfolio = ['tsp5_project_portfolio_user'];

PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.pm_program = ['it_project_user','it_demand_user','it_program_manager','it_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp1_program = ['tsp1_project_user','tsp1_demand_user','tsp1_program_manager','tsp1_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp2_program = ['tsp2_project_user','tsp2_demand_user','tsp2_program_manager','tsp2_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp3_program = ['tsp3_project_user','tsp3_demand_user','tsp3_program_manager','tsp3_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp4_program = ['tsp4_project_user','tsp4_demand_user','tsp4_program_manager','tsp4_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp5_program = ['tsp5_project_user','tsp5_demand_user','tsp5_program_manager','tsp5_portfolio_manager'];

PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.pm_program_task = ['it_project_user','it_demand_user','it_program_manager','it_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp1_program_task = ['tsp1_project_user','tsp1_demand_user','tsp1_program_manager','tsp1_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp2_program_task = ['tsp2_project_user','tsp2_demand_user','tsp2_program_manager','tsp2_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp3_program_task = ['tsp3_project_user','tsp3_demand_user','tsp3_program_manager','tsp3_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp4_program_task = ['tsp4_project_user','tsp4_demand_user','tsp4_program_manager','tsp4_portfolio_manager'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp5_program_task = ['tsp5_project_user','tsp5_demand_user','tsp5_program_manager','tsp5_portfolio_manager'];

PPMRoleClassMapper.validateAccess = function(user, table) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
	var roles = [];
	if ( gr.instanceOf('pm_project') || gr.instanceOf('pm_project_task') )
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getProjectRole('user', table));
	if ( gr.instanceOf('pm_portfolio_project') || gr.instanceOf('pm_portfolio') )
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getPortfolioUser(table));
	if ( gr.instanceOf('pm_program') || gr.instanceOf('pm_program_task') ) {
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getProjectRole('user', table));
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getDemandRole('user', table));
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getProgramRole('manager', table));
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getPortfolioManager(table));
	}
	for (var i=0; i< roles.length; i++) {
		if(user.hasRole(roles[i]))
			return true;
	} 
	return false;

// 	var requiredRoles = PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap[table];
// 	for (var i=0; i< requiredRoles.length; i++) {
// 		if(user.hasRole(requiredRoles[i]))
// 			return true;
// 	} 
// 	return false;
};

PPMRoleClassMapper.getClasses = function(entity, user) {
	var classes = [];
	var key;
	if ( entity == 'project' )
		key = 'projectEntities';
	else if ( entity == 'project_task' )
		key = 'projectTaskEntities';
	else if ( entity == 'portfolio' )
		key = 'portfolioEntities';
	else if ( entity == 'portfolio_project' )
		key = 'portfolioProjectEntities';
	for ( var i=0; i<PPMRoleClassMapper[key].length; i++ ) {
		if ( PPMRoleClassMapper.validateAccess(user, PPMRoleClassMapper[key][i]) )
			classes.push(PPMRoleClassMapper[key][i]);
	}
	return classes.join(",");
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-05-12 05:29:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>80e3ec920b9312000c04ed3ab4673a50</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PPMRoleClassMapper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">c7c742bf6f390200d45331012e3ee496</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_80e3ec920b9312000c04ed3ab4673a50</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-28 14:51:02</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Ajax utility to to create a related entity from a Demand based on the user-defined type. This script extends the vendor-provided Demand Management utility script.</description><name>AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand</name><script><![CDATA[var AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand = Class.create();
AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    createTrackedTask: function(demand_id, resultAsObject) {
        var demand;
        var trackedTask;
        var trackedTaskId;
        var trackedTaskNumber;
        var tableDisplayName;
		
        demand = this._getDemand(demand_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error retrieving demand");
            return;
        }
        
        trackedTask = new GlideRecord('u_tracked_task');
        trackedTask.initialize();
        trackedTask.setValue("short_description", demand.short_description);
		trackedTask.setValue('sys_domain', demand.sys_domain);
        trackedTaskId = trackedTask.insert();
        trackedTaskNumber = trackedTask.getValue('number');
        tableDisplayName = trackedTask.getClassDisplayValue();
        
        //update demand with task details
        if(JSUtil.nil(demand.related_records))
            demand.related_records = trackedTaskId;
        else
            demand.related_records = demand.related_records + "," + trackedTaskId;
        
        demand.u_task = trackedTaskId;
        demand.state = '8';
        demand.stage = 'task';
        demand.update();
        
        return this._inExpectedFormat({'sys_id': trackedTaskId, 'number' : trackedTaskNumber, 'label' : tableDisplayName}, resultAsObject);
    },
    
    createTechnologyProposal: function(demand_id, resultAsObject) {
        var demand;
        var tp;
        var tpId;
        var tpNumber;
        var tableDisplayName;
        
        demand = this._getDemand(demand_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error creating demand");
            return;
        }
        
        tp = new GlideRecord('task');
        tp.initialize();
        tp.setValue("short_description", demand.short_description);
        tp.setValue("parent", demand.sys_id);
		tp.setValue('sys_domain', demand.sys_domain);
        tpId = tp.insert();
        tpNumber = tp.getValue('number');
        tableDisplayName = tp.getClassDisplayValue();
        
        //update demand with tech proposal details
        if(JSUtil.nil(demand.related_records))
            demand.related_records = tpId;
        else
            demand.related_records = demand.related_records + "," + tpId;
        
        demand.u_tech_prop = tpId;
        demand.state = '8';
        demand.stage = 'tech_prop';
        demand.update();
        
        return this._inExpectedFormat({'sys_id': tpId, 'number' : tpNumber, 'label' :tableDisplayName}, resultAsObject);
    },
	
    createVendorAgreement: function(demand_id, resultAsObject) {
        var demand;
        var vend;
        var vendId;
        var vendNumber;
        var tableDisplayName;
        
        demand = this._getDemand(demand_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error creating demand");
            return;
        }
        
        vend = new GlideRecord('task');
        vend.initialize();
        vend.setValue("short_description", demand.short_description);
        vend.setValue("parent", demand.sys_id);
		vend.setValue('sys_domain', demand.sys_domain);
        vendId = vend.insert();
        vendNumber = vend.getValue('number');
        tableDisplayName = vend.getClassDisplayValue();
        
        //update demand with vendor agreement details
        if(JSUtil.nil(demand.related_records))
            demand.related_records = vendId;
        else
            demand.related_records = demand.related_records + "," + vendId;
        
        demand.u_vendor = vendId;
        demand.state = '8';
        demand.stage = 'vendor';
        demand.update();
        
        return this._inExpectedFormat({'sys_id': vendId, 'number' : vendNumber, 'label' :tableDisplayName}, resultAsObject);
    },

	createCustomerServiceRequest: function(demand_id, resultAsObject) {
        var demand;
        var csr;
        var csrId;
        var csrNumber;
        var tableDisplayName;
        
        demand = this._getDemand(demand_id || this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error creating demand");
            return;
        }
        
        csr = new GlideRecord('task');
        csr.initialize();
        csr.setValue("short_description", demand.short_description);
        csr.setValue("parent", demand.sys_id);
		csr.setValue('sys_domain', demand.sys_domain);
        csrId = csr.insert();
        csrNumber = csr.getValue('number');
        tableDisplayName = csr.getClassDisplayValue();
        
        //update demand with csr details
        if(JSUtil.nil(demand.related_records))
            demand.related_records = csrId;
        else
            demand.related_records = demand.related_records + "," + csrId;
        
        demand.u_csr = csrId;
        demand.state = '8';
        demand.stage = 'csr';
        demand.update();
        
        return this._inExpectedFormat({'sys_id': csrId, 'number' : csrNumber, 'label' :tableDisplayName}, resultAsObject);
    },
    
    fetchDemandEntityDetails: function() {
        var demand = this._getDemand(this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_id'));
        var demandEntityDetails = {};
        var choiceGr;
        var entityType;
        var response;
        if (!demand) {
            gs.log("Error fetching demand with sys_id:"+sys_id);
            return;
        }
        choiceGr = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
        choiceGr.addQuery('name', 'dmn_demand');
        choiceGr.addQuery('element', 'type');
        choiceGr.query();
        while(choiceGr.next()){
            entityType =  choiceGr.getValue('value');
            demandEntityDetails[entityType] = demand.getValue(entityType);
        }
        demandEntityDetails.sys_id = demand.getValue('sys_id');
        demandEntityDetails.short_description = demand.getValue('short_description');
        demandEntityDetails.type = demand.getValue('type');
        demandEntityDetails.label = demand.getDisplayValue('type');
        response = this._JSONEncode(demandEntityDetails);
        
        return response;
    },
    
    _getDemand: function(sys_id) {
        var demand = new GlideRecord('dmn_demand');
        if (demand.get(sys_id))
            return demand;
        
        return null;
    },
    
    _inExpectedFormat: function(obj, resultAsObject) {
        return (resultAsObject) ? obj : this._JSONEncode(obj);
    },
    
    _JSONEncode: function(obj) {
        return (new JSON()).encode(obj);
    },

    type: 'AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-07 14:49:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>807e3955dbb357006bb976740f961916</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AjaxCreateUserDefinedRelatedEntityFromDemand</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_807e3955dbb357006bb976740f961916</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-27 18:40:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TrackedTaskDatesUtil</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utility functions for calculating dates on Tracked Tasks</description><name>TrackedTaskDatesUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var TrackedTaskDatesUtil = Class.create();
TrackedTaskDatesUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
    
    //returns GlideDateTime
    getEndDate: function(/*GlideDateTime*/startDate, /*GlideDuration*/duration) {
        PPMDebug.log("Into TrackedTaskDatesUtil.getEndDate -> " + startDate + " | " + duration);
        var durationMs = duration.getNumericValue();
        if(durationMs < 0)
            durationMs = 0;
        if(durationMs == 0)
            return startDate;
        else {
            var gDate = new GlideDateTime();            
            gDate.setValue(startDate.getValue());
            var durationInSeconds = durationMs / 1000;
            gDate.addSeconds(durationInSeconds);
            return gDate;
        }
    },
    
    //returns GlideDuration
    getDuration: function(/*GlideDateTime*/startDate, /*GlideDateTime*/endDate) {
        PPMDebug.log("Into TrackedTaskDatesUtil.getDuration -> " + startDate + " | " + endDate);
        var duration = new GlideDuration(0);
        duration = GlideDateTime.subtract(startDate, endDate);
        PPMDebug.log("Into TrackedTaskDatesUtil.getDuration: Return -> " + duration);
        return duration;
    },
    
    type: 'TrackedTaskDatesUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-31 13:53:33</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>d4c85dcddb10a3006373748e0f961930</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TrackedTaskDatesUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d4c85dcddb10a3006373748e0f961930</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-31 14:42:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.PPMRoleClassMapper</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>PPMRoleClassMapper</name><script><![CDATA[PPMRoleClassMapper = Class.create();

PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap = {};

PPMRoleClassMapper.projectEntities = ['pm_project', 'tsp1_project', 'tsp2_project', 'tsp3_project', 'tsp4_project', 'tsp5_project'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.projectTaskEntities = ['pm_project_task', 'tsp1_project_task', 'tsp2_project_task', 'tsp3_project_task', 'tsp4_project_task', 'tsp5_project_task', 'u_tracked_task'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.portfolioEntities = ['pm_portfolio', 'tsp1_portfolio', 'tsp2_portfolio', 'tsp3_portfolio', 'tsp4_portfolio', 'tsp5_portfolio'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.portfolioProjectEntities = ['pm_portfolio_project', 'tsp1_portfolio_project', 'tsp2_portfolio_project', 'tsp3_portfolio_project', 'tsp4_portfolio_project', 'tsp5_portfolio_project'];

PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.pm_project = ['it_project_user'];
PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap.tsp1_project = ['tsp1_project_user'];

PPMRoleClassMapper.validateAccess = function(user, table) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord(table);
	var roles = [];
	if ( gr.instanceOf('pm_project') || gr.instanceOf('pm_project_task') || gr.instanceOf('u_tracked_task') )
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getProjectRole('user', table));
	if ( gr.instanceOf('pm_portfolio_project') || gr.instanceOf('pm_portfolio') )
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getPortfolioUser(table));
	if ( gr.instanceOf('pm_program') || gr.instanceOf('pm_program_task') ) {
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getProjectRole('user', table));
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getDemandRole('user', table));
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getProgramRole('manager', table));
		roles.push(SNC.PPMConfig.getPortfolioManager(table));
	}
	for (var i=0; i< roles.length; i++) {
		if(user.hasRole(roles[i]))
			return true;
	} 
	return false;

// 	var requiredRoles = PPMRoleClassMapper.roleMap[table];
// 	for (var i=0; i< requiredRoles.length; i++) {
// 		if(user.hasRole(requiredRoles[i]))
// 			return true;
// 	} 
// 	return false;
};

PPMRoleClassMapper.getClasses = function(entity, user) {
	var classes = [];
	var key;
	if ( entity == 'project' )
		key = 'projectEntities';
	else if ( entity == 'project_task' )
		key = 'projectTaskEntities';
	else if ( entity == 'portfolio' )
		key = 'portfolioEntities';
	else if ( entity == 'portfolio_project' )
		key = 'portfolioProjectEntities';
	for ( var i=0; i<PPMRoleClassMapper[key].length; i++ ) {
		if ( PPMRoleClassMapper.validateAccess(user, PPMRoleClassMapper[key][i]) )
			classes.push(PPMRoleClassMapper[key][i]);
	}
	return classes.join(",");
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-28 14:51:08</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>76290e8cdbdc27006bb976740f96194d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>PPMRoleClassMapper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_76290e8cdbdc27006bb976740f96194d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-30 18:15:07</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8f675101db50a3006373748e0f961924
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AjaxTrackedTaskUtil</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Ajax utility to calculate the end date and duration for the tracked tasks and children planned tasks</description><name>AjaxTrackedTaskUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var AjaxTrackedTaskUtil = Class.create();
AjaxTrackedTaskUtil.prototype =
Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    
    ttdUtil: new TrackedTaskDatesUtil(),
    
    getTrackedTaskStartDate: function() {
        var startDate;
        var trackedTaskId = this.getParameter("sysparm_trackedTask");
        var gr = new GlideRecord("u_tracked_task");
        if (gr.get(trackedTaskId))
            startDate = gr.start_date.getDisplayValue();
        return startDate || new GlideDate().getDisplayValue();
    },
    
    getEndDate: function() {
        // CHECK: Try to use the display value as internal value, Else it will add one hour for DST as per the display value
        PPMDebug.log("Into AjaxTrackedTaskUtil.getEndDate -> " + this.getParameter('sysparm_start_date'));
        var startDate = this.getInternalDateFormat(this.getParameter('sysparm_start_date'));
        var duration = new GlideDuration(0);
        duration.setDisplayValue(this.getParameter('sysparm_duration'));
        return this.ttdUtil.getEndDate(startDate, duration).getDisplayValue();
    },
    
    getDuration: function() {
        // CHECK: Try to use the display value as internal value, Else it will add one hour for DST as per the display value
        PPMDebug.log("Into AjaxTrackedTaskUtil.getDuration -> " + this.getParameter('sysparm_start_date') + " | " + 
            this.getParameter('sysparm_end_date'));
        var startDate = this.getInternalDateFormat(this.getParameter('sysparm_start_date'));
        var endDate = this.getInternalDateFormat(this.getParameter('sysparm_end_date'));
        var duration = this.ttdUtil.getDuration(startDate, endDate);
        return duration.getDurationValue();
    },
    
    getInternalDateFormat: function (displayValue) {
        PPMDebug.log("Into AjaxTrackedTaskUtil.getInternalDateFormat: -> " + displayValue);
        var dateTime = new GlideDateTime("1970-01-01 00:00:00");
        dateTime.setDisplayValue(displayValue);
        if(dateTime.isValid()) {
            PPMDebug.log("Into AjaxTrackedTaskUtil.getInternalDateFormat: Return -> " + dateTime.getValue());
            return dateTime;
        } else {
            PPMDebug.log("Into AjaxTrackedTaskUtil.getInternalDateFormat: Return -> 1970-01-01 00:00:00");
            return new GlideDateTime("1970-01-01 00:00:00");
        }
    },
    
    type: 'AjaxTrackedTaskUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-31 13:47:44</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8f675101db50a3006373748e0f961924</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AjaxTrackedTaskUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8f675101db50a3006373748e0f961924</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-31 14:40:18</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Projects users can read Tracked Tasks</description><name>u_tracked_task</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[if ( gs.hasRole('it_project_user') ) {
	var sysClass = current.sys_class_name || current.getRecordClassName() || current.getTableName();
	if ( PPMRoleClassMapper.validateAccess(gs.getUser(), sysClass) )
		answer = true;
	else
		answer = false;
}
else
	answer = true;]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-28 14:57:23</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>fc4a4680db1067006bb976740f9619e3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_tracked_task</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_fc4a4680db1067006bb976740f9619e3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Keith.Tucker@hhs.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-08-30 18:09:55</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
